about_the_game:
This starter pack helps you to level up at the lower ranks a bit. Includes a special premium tank, 500 gold and 3 days of premium time.

BT-2 - The agile scout

This russian tier I premium tank isn't only good at scouting enemies, but also at annoying them. Use its high movement capabilities to sneak around your enemies, to scout them for your team and to distract them with your 37mm main gun. The BT-2 attacks as fast as it's able to retreat, confusing the enemy can make the difference between victory and defeat!

Premium Tanks earn +50% more silver and crew experience during battles.

500 gold

Gold can be used ingame to buy silver, premium time, premium vehicles and more. Use it to climb the tech tree even faster!

3 days of premium time

With an active premium account you will earn +50% more silver and crew experience during battles. Use this additional experience to train up your own, legendary ace crew!
detailed_description:
This starter pack helps you to level up at the lower ranks a bit. Includes a special premium tank, 500 gold and 3 days of premium time.

BT-2 - The agile scout

This russian tier I premium tank isn't only good at scouting enemies, but also at annoying them. Use its high movement capabilities to sneak around your enemies, to scout them for your team and to distract them with your 37mm main gun. The BT-2 attacks as fast as it's able to retreat, confusing the enemy can make the difference between victory and defeat!

Premium Tanks earn +50% more silver and crew experience during battles.

500 gold

Gold can be used ingame to buy silver, premium time, premium vehicles and more. Use it to climb the tech tree even faster!

3 days of premium time

With an active premium account you will earn +50% more silver and crew experience during battles. Use this additional experience to train up your own, legendary ace crew!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3 or equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 680, OpenGL 3.2 or higher
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Only 64-bit systems are supported
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5 or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 680, OpenGL 3.2 or higher
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Only 64-bit systems are supported

name: Tanks2.DE - Starter Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7, 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3 or equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 520 or DirectX 11 compatible equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Only 64-bit systems are supported
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10, 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5 or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 680 or DirectX 11 compatible equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Only 64-bit systems are supported
